modifier.chromatic_construct.anti_air.de: Tool does bonus damage to airborne targets!
modifier.chromatic_construct.moonbound.d: Reduces the gravity of the wearer
modifier.chromatic_construct.infernal.fl: From the depths of the Nether
modifier.chromatic_construct.infernal.de: Tool has multiplied mining speed when you are on fire
modifier.chromatic_construct.snowball.de: Tool can conjure snowballs at the cost of durability
modifier.chromatic_construct.riding.desc: Causes the shooter to ride the fired arrow when fired from the ground. Might hurt!
modifier.chromatic_construct.fragile_pro: Protects against all damage, but briefly stops protecting after sustaining damage
modifier.chromatic_construct.encumbermen: Prevents picking up items when worn
modifier.chromatic_construct.heartstoppe: Attacked mobs briefly lose the ability to heal
modifier.chromatic_construct.panic.descr: Increases movement speed after being attacked
modifier.chromatic_construct.harvest_shi: Harvested crops have a chance to protect the tool from future damage
modifier.chromatic_construct.slayer.desc: Tool does bonus damage to monsters!
modifier.chromatic_construct.backstep.de: Melee attacks cause the attacker to leap backward
modifier.chromatic_construct.nemesis.des: Melee attacks also cause the attacker to take damage
modifier.chromatic_construct.sorrow.desc: Taking damage occasionally inflicts negative effects
modifier.chromatic_construct.variety.des: Increases mining or draw speed based on the number of unique materials the tool has
modifier.chromatic_construct.shocking.de: Increases mining or draw speed, but breaking blocks has a chance to electrocute you
fluid.chromatic_construct.molten_inferni: Molten Infernium can be useful for mining, if you can beat the heat.
fluid.chromatic_construct.molten_etheriu: Molten Etherium can be powerful in combat, but it is also expensive.
material.chromatic_construct.hamhide.fla: This material empowers you with the same abilities of the animals you had to sacrifice to make it! Make it count.
material.chromatic_construct.hamhide.arm: Increases movement speed by 10% per level after being attacked
Home-grown crops are good for you. With this, they'll be good for your tool, too!
Breaking fully grown crops has a 20% chance per level of granting +3 harvest shield
material.chromatic_construct.cosmite.fla: What goes up must come down, except for this apparently
material.chromatic_construct.cosmite.enc: Grants +1.5 damage per level against targets that are not touching the ground. Tool defies gravity when dropped
material.chromatic_construct.cosmite.arm: Reduces the wearer's gravity by 25%, multiplicatively with other pieces. Armor defies gravity when dropped
material.chromatic_construct.infernium.f: Do you like third-degree burns? No? Too bad!
material.chromatic_construct.infernium.e: Grants +1% mining speed per second of fire, up to +15% from lava's 15 seconds. Bonus reduced by fire resistance.
material.chromatic_construct.etherium.fl: It appears melting this metal diluted its power. Fortunately, it's still usable.
material.chromatic_construct.etherium.en: Attacking entities knocks the attacker backwards. Distance scales based on trait level
material.chromatic_construct.etherium.ar: Reduces damage taken by 5% per level while below 40% health
material.chromatic_construct.chroma.flav: What a pretty material. Pretty WEAK! The trait's decent, though.
material.chromatic_construct.chroma.ency: Increases mining speed by 5% per level, multiplied by the number of unique materials the tool has
material.chromatic_construct.chroma.rang: Increases draw speed by 0.05 per level, multiplied by the number of unique materials the tool has
material.chromatic_construct.energized_s: If you thought that this material would let you charge your tool, too bad! You can only charge yourself, and not in a good way.
Increases mining speed by 10% per level, but every block broken has a 1 in (30 / level) chance to deal 2 damage
Increases draw speed by 7% per level, but every shot fired has a 1 in (15 / level) chance to deal 2 damage
